value:
It seems like there are lots of people
around ready to fight. Maybe I can
just hang back and cheer them on...

Claude works so hard at pushing me
and others to be our best. I figured
I'd save him the trouble for once.

Hey, what are you up to? I'm hungry.
Want to get a bite to eat with me?

I got my hands on materials to make
some new fashion accessories.
Any requests?

If you knew me a couple years ago,
you'd be shocked by how motivated
I am now.

You're $Nu, right?$k$pToday's your lucky day! I'm here
with a message for you.
Yeah, yeah. I know I'm great.
I'm pretty happy with this.
Aww, just when I was getting excited.
With this, I'll be even more useful.

If you really need my help, I'm willing
to put a little work in. Just enough to
meet your expectations, obviously.

You haven't somehow gotten it into
your head that I'm a hard worker,
have you, $Nu?$k$pI'd hate for people around here to get
that idea just because I've been doing
a little more than usual lately.$k$pI try not to work too hard, because
the harder you work, the more
people expect from you.$k$pFor you, though...I wouldn't mind
putting a little more effort in. I'd
like to be useful to you.$k$pBut that doesn't mean you get to
expect it of me all the time, OK?
You have to promise!
Now I'm mad!
Want to see what I've got?
Out you go!
Here's the finisher!
Tried too hard...
Do you want me to cheer you on?
Hey! Cut it out!
Ohh! You have an interest in fashion? Come and have a little chat with me!
I may be a delicate flower, but when I need to, I can get things done.
I suppose I should train a little every now and then!
Hm... What will I do if Holst shows up?
So, are you going to say you want me to protect you now?
Better get going!
What is it?
I'm off!
